label: Golf Resorts and Courses
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to golf resorts, courses, equipment, and services.
intents: Find a golf course near me

subcategories.label: Golf Resorts
subcategories.description: Resorts that offer golf courses and related amenities.

subcategories.label: Golf Courses
subcategories.description: Courses where golf is played, including public and private courses.

subcategories.label: Golf Equipment
subcategories.description: Equipment used for playing golf, including clubs, balls, and accessories.

subcategories.label: Golf Services
subcategories.description: Services related to golf, including lessons, club fitting, and course management.
